title: Doily
medium:
Medium: cotton, glass beads
Technique: embroidery
description: Rectangular length of white cotton with two short ends in pointed scallops. Beading and fringe only on scalloped ends. In each scallop is a vase with a blossoming plant springing from it. Polychrome beads used.
name: Doily
